name: Jasmine Rice Moisturizer
description:
Asian women secret to beautiful skin. The Jasmine Rice Cream is handmade with fresh Jasmine Rice, infused with Rice Bran Oil, for a smooth complexion.

Made-to-Order

•Best used 12 months from date of purchase
•Stored in cool place

Key Ingredients
◦Jasmine Rice Milk
◦Rice Bran Oil
◦Aloe Vera

name: Mayo Hair Conditioner
description:
Mayo Hair Conditioner is excellent for restoring shine and strengthening hair.Protein hair treatment to improve damage hair and stop breakage Our Mayo Hair Conditioner is packed with nourishing ingredients to stimulate healthy hair growth.

How to use: Apply to hair cover with plastic cap,leave for 25-30 minutes. For damage hair leave on for 45 minutes used hair dryer  for deep conditioning. Condition hair weekly to improve split ends and breakage.

Ingredients:

Egg Yolk
Aloe Vera
Natural Oils

name: Masonic Soap
description:
“If a man empties his purse into his head, no man can take it away from him. An investment in knowledge always pays the best interest.” — Benjamin Franklin American writer, humorist, ambassador, inventor and Freemason

Net Wt. 5oz

Ingredients
Olive Oil, Coconut Oil, Canola Oil, Castor Oil, Shea Butter, Coconut Milk, Sodium Hydroxide, Colorant, Fragrance Oil

name: Rasta Soap
description:
"Every man gotta right to decide his own destiny,"Bob Marley

Our Rasta soap has a lightly scented aroma notes of Amber and Vanilla to warm up the blend. We added a litttle island swagg  with  a mix of Mango, Coconut and Pineapple rolled into one sweet scent. Made with natural oils including Hemp Oil and Coconut Milk. 





Ingredients:

•Organic Hemp Oil, Coconut Oil, Olive Oil, Canola Oil, Castor Oil, Shea Butter, Coconut Milk, Soy Milk, Sodium Hydroxide, Fragrance Oil, Pigment Colorant.

name: Avocado Butter
description:
Avocado Butter with Beeswax is a great hair and body moisturizer. This all natural butter is excellent for dry hair and dry skin. Our fresh Avocado is infused in oil.  Contains No Fragrance, No Colorant, No Preservative. 
Self-life around 6-12 months. Note: the photo is a 2 oz tin container Avocado Butter comes in a 4 oz jar.

Ingredients:

Fresh Avocados(infused in Soybean Oil,Sunflower Oil,and Canola Oil)
Avocado Oil
Beeswax
